dmca.title: DMCA Complaint - Pure Pearls
dmca.body:
March 6, 2007 

Dear Google, 

The following website, www.menalisa.cn, is copying large amounts of content and images directly off of our website, www.PurePearls.com. We have sent notice to them at the email listed on Whois.net under their registered domain name to zczsf@vip.sina.com with no response. 

The following pages are in violation of our copyrighted materials and you will even find our company name all over their content: 

1. http://www.menalisa.cn/barogue
